topics.body:
A bit of video game news, but sunset devs is getting shut down.

I'll summarize why this is important enough though they were a small company:
The company tried relying on ad revenue from sites like RPS and that; the thing is though that they willingly admit that the sites they advertised with weren't enough and that don't bring in enough revenue and that the majority of the people using those sites use adblock.

To make it sweet and short: gamers hate Kotaku, Polygon and Rock Paper Shotgun, Offworld so much now that if you try to ally with them your company is going bye bye.

How much money do game developers now get from these sites?  $0
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
"@SeraphimDawn":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5587b64563687230a40017ce#post_5587b64563687230a40017ce
no, the forum is populated with people i don't like and i'm pretty much a pariah there

i'm hoping to see some people that i haven't in a long while and try to learn what's happened to everyone. i'm honestly expecting the worst, but i don't really know because i was hemorrhaging brain cells when i was perma'd. i mean seriously, if you want stupid, you dont want the type of stupid i was it was so bad

like i've said before, everyone cool's moved on. this will just be a cool little bonus thing, like a "where are they now" episode but of people you think are so nonchalantly repugnant that you cringe at the very sound of anything resembling their usernames

it would be a shame if they saw this, but i'm just about 100% sure they dont even know if ponies exist anymore or not

"@SeraphimDawn":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5587ba2363687213fc00683f#post_5587ba2363687213fc00683f
well our group existed since febuary of 2011, if bungie were really doing it just to "take things well" they wouldve done just that in 2011, not wait until the middle of 2012

i have no knowledge of the people who ran the group for a while, they call themselves piggymccult and i've disliked just about every member that ive met. wouldnt go as far enough to call them sjws though, i think that was just one person

went by the name turntechlockheed or something like that last i saw him, though i think i'm getting part of his name confused with this one guy's old oc; jet lockheed

topics.body:
I have 18 hours to finish my marketing final; 1 research paper, 4 papers, 3 quizzes and 3 discussions to do, been slacking off a fair bit, haven't even looked at my research paper that it was supposed to be a five person month long paper, need to do actual scientifically backed sources and I don't even have a single inkling what I am going to do with the paper nor do I have a rough draft.

42 hours for precalculas; need to do 3 quizzes and a test.

"There's a old Earth saying Captain.  A phrase of great power and wisdom and consolation to the soul in times of need"
!http://media.tumblr.com/tumblr_m0socaEKmA1r02r82.gif!
Am I going to do it and am I going to manage to pass?
!http://media.giphy.com/media/7cwH4V3idXKSY/giphy.gif!
With time to spare!
